channel.title: Ebpf on strange invitation
channel.description: Recent content in Ebpf on strange invitation

item.title: eBPF for SSL packet inspections
item.description: As a retrospection of task in a process, i’ve had a task to intercept http traffic sent by different processes with encryption using openssl. Main points of that task (related to eBPF) were: eBPF uprobes for SSL_* functions (to obtain data that was sent/recived) eBPF kprobes for tcp_sendmsg/tcp_recvmsg (to obtain src/dst hosts/ports) a lot of tracepoints (primarily to map fd) Setting development environment I’m using WSL2 with arch on windows platform, so we’re having env problems :D First take was clion - but, sadly, I’ve failed to set up make projets >_<
